    *   $120,350  [Click here for full solution]()
<p>&nbsp;</p>


*  If a perpetuity pays $200 at the end of each week, and the current rate of interest is 2.75% compounded monthly, what is the fair market value today of the perpetuity?

<p>&nbsp;</p>
